name: NEVADA COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE
sampleDescriptions: Assist Nevada County Sheriffs Office in negotiating a new higher per diem rate for housing federal prisoners for U.S. Marshals Service.
Assist Nevada County Sheriffs Office in negotiating a new higher per diem rate for housing federal prisoners for U.S. Marshals Service.
Assist Nevada County Sheriffs Office in negotiating a new higher per diem rate for housing federal prisoners for U.S. Marshals Service in the Wayne Brown Correctional Facility.
